intro: Survive the zombie apocalypse! Kill zombies to stay alive in this thrilling game. Experience 2-player arcade-style gameplay and cooperate to defeat approaching zombies.
description:
Escape the relentless hordes of zombies! This quarter-view action game features a cinematic storyline where the protagonists from the previous installment once again fight for survival.
Use various weapons and items to survive in the zombie world! There are several cooperative modes for 1 to 2 players.
By passing a "Joy-Con™" to another player to "share," you can start a two-player game anywhere.

・Enjoy thrilling action as you defeat countless hordes of zombies with a variety of weapons.
・Clear increasingly difficult WAVES while fending off approaching zombies.
・Collect and upgrade unique weapons.
・Various items appear as you clear WAVES to help you win.
・Face various zombies of different sizes with unique attacks, adding to the fun of the battle.
・Collect all the special and varied weapons that fit the zombie apocalypse theme.
・Complete stages by surviving to the end of WAVES with 1-2 players working together.
・Enjoy a satisfying gameplay and reach the grand finale by surviving and completing the final stage! What kind of ending awaits you?

Share one "Joy-Con™" with another player for "sharing"!
Cooperative play anywhere by sharing controllers.
Enjoy arcade-style gameplay with up to 2-player cooperative mode!
Team up with a friend to survive the zombie world and experience the touching ending together!

Prologue
One day, the skies above the city were shrouded in darkness, and the once peaceful town was thrown into chaos by a sudden zombie attack. People, gripped by fear, were scrambling to flee, and the city quickly turned to rubble. Many fled for safety, but two people remained in the heart of the city.

MIKE is a streamer known for broadcasting live horror games. Despite his soft voice, he has excellent shooting skills. One day during a live broadcast, he witnessed zombies taking over the city and used his platform to broadcast the situation and send messages of hope to the survivors. As his fans cheered him on in real time, MIKE realized he had to become a survivor, not just an observer.
Meanwhile, KELLEY, a high school physical education teacher, is an avid fan and subscriber of MIKE. She enjoys various sports, especially biking and hiking, and led the survivors with her vibrant personality and strong leadership skills. She took responsibility for the safety of the students remaining in the gym and sought a safe place for them.

The two happened to meet in a corner of town. MIKE was gathering his broadcasting equipment while KELLEY was looking for weapons to protect the students. Recognizing each other's abilities, they decide to work together to overcome the zombie threat and plan their escape from the city.
Amidst the chaos of the city, they manage to contact a government rescue helicopter. They must survive the relentless onslaught of zombies until the helicopter arrives. Now begins the journey of survival for these two protagonists.
